profile.name: Eleven (Jane Hopper)
profile.headline: The world's only verified telekinetic operative with combat experience against interdimensional threats. Escaped government captivity, closed dimensional breaches, and saved an entire town — multiple times — before her 16th birthday.
profile.executiveSummary: Raised in a classified government laboratory and trained from birth in psychokinetic abilities, Eleven escaped captivity and became the primary defense against interdimensional incursions threatening Hawkins, Indiana. Despite severe social skill gaps from institutional upbringing, she has demonstrated extraordinary courage, emotional growth, and the ability to form deep bonds. Her unique capabilities have no equivalent in any known workforce.

evidence.outcome: Closed interdimensional gate preventing extinction-level event
evidence.description: Applied maximum telekinetic force to seal breach between dimensions, saving population of Hawkins and potentially beyond

evidence.outcome: Defeated Demogorgon, Mind Flayer avatar, and Vecna using psychokinetic abilities
evidence.description: Engaged and neutralized multiple existential threats through focused application of telekinetic power

evidence.outcome: Located missing persons across state lines through psychic remote viewing
evidence.description: Used sensory deprivation technique to project consciousness and locate individuals at great distance

evidence.outcome: Gathered real-time intelligence on enemy positions and movements
evidence.description: Provided actionable intelligence through remote viewing that enabled tactical planning

evidence.outcome: Engaged and defeated 5+ hostile entities in direct combat across 4 crisis events
evidence.description: Applied telekinetic abilities in combat situations against threats that conventional weapons could not stop

evidence.outcome: Identified Vecna as primary threat and developed strategy to engage him in psychic domain
evidence.description: Assessed threat hierarchy and determined that direct psychic engagement was only viable approach

evidence.outcome: Developed improvised sensory deprivation environments in field conditions
evidence.description: Used bathtubs, pools, and improvised containers to achieve states required for remote viewing capabilities

evidence.outcome: Maintained focus and emotional control during life-threatening combat situations
evidence.description: Channeled emotions constructively rather than destructively when using abilities under extreme stress

evidence.outcome: Communicated effectively with limited vocabulary during early post-laboratory period
evidence.description: Used gesture, expression, and emotional resonance to build connections despite severe language limitations

evidence.outcome: Progressed from 50-word vocabulary to conversational fluency within 2 years
evidence.description: Rapidly acquired language skills through immersion, mentorship from Hopper, and social interaction with peers

evidence.outcome: Survived independently in wilderness and urban environments as a child
evidence.description: Applied resourcefulness and determination to survive alone after escaping laboratory, finding shelter and food independently

evidence.outcome: Voluntarily faced existential threats that no one else could, accepting personal sacrifice
evidence.description: Chose to confront Vecna and close the gate knowing it could mean her own death

evidence.outcome: Recovered from institutional abuse, isolation, and loss of abilities to fight again
evidence.description: Overcame childhood trauma, social isolation, and temporary loss of powers to return stronger

evidence.outcome: Formed deep emotional bonds despite severe social deprivation in childhood
evidence.description: Demonstrated extraordinary capacity for love and connection despite institutional upbringing designed to suppress emotion

evidence.outcome: Regained lost telekinetic abilities through sheer force of will and emotional breakthrough
evidence.description: Recovered powers through confronting traumatic memories, demonstrating that determination can overcome even neurological limitations

evidence.outcome: Adapted from laboratory captivity to normal teenage life within 2 years
evidence.description: Navigated enormous transition from controlled institutional environment to family, school, and social life

evidence.outcome: Returned from California to Hawkins to protect friends when threat emerged
evidence.description: Traveled across the country to rejoin friends in danger, choosing them over personal safety

workHistory.title: Primary Threat Response Operative
workHistory.description: Sole individual capable of engaging interdimensional threats. Closed gates, defeated entities, and protected civilian population across 4 major crisis events.

workHistory.title: Test Subject 011
workHistory.description: Raised in classified government facility. Trained in psychokinetic abilities. Escaped at age 12.

purpose: Friends don't lie. And I don't let my friends get hurt.
